caption: A group of people gathers in the living room to discuss an issue. Three individuals are walking down the street. Someone lies on a bed, reading a book. A shadow jumps over a fence in the darkness. In the daytime, a person dressed in military attire enters a house. It appears to be a bar. They take off their glasses and converse with people seated at the bar. Later, they dance with a woman in the dance hall. A man and a woman stand at the door, and then a group of police officers arrives. They take the man away in a police car. The car appears at a prison the next day. One man practices boxing by punching a punching bag.
